history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: Rplus_0_r. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rplus_0_r,Rplus_opp_r. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rplus_0_r,Rplus_0_l,Rplus_opp_r.

exceptions.exn: In environment r : R -> Prop The term "r" has type "R -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "R".
Found no subterm matching "0" in the current goal.
The LHS of Rplus_0_l (0 + _) does not match any subterm of the goal
Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

original: intros r. rewrite <- Rplus_0_r with (r - r). rewrite <- Rplus_opp_r. rewrite Rplus_0_l. reflexivity.
